TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UITableViewCellSelectionStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines the appearance of a cell when it is selected.
Docs.remarks: Used to set the of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSelectionStyle Blue = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The cell background turns blue when it is selected. This is the default behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSelectionStyle Gray = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The cell background turns gray when it is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSelectionStyle None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: There is no change to the cell's appearance when it is selected.
